name: Remember The Milk widely(1000px)
description:
This style makes "Remember The Milk" widely(about 1000px). for users who are using high resolution monitor(XGA without sidebar or SXGA with sidebar). 

Related styles: style 3284, 1200px version to style 3274.
Other recommended styles: style 4887.

Fixed !important statement on 2007/08/28. I'm sorry the previous release didn't work.

discussions.name: Doesn't work for me with FF 2.0.6 and Stylish 0.5.
